page.title: 17TOPICAL/CONTROVERSIAL TOPICS
page.content: Two controversial issues dominate the local scene.Lytham Baths, built in l86l, and radically in l928 is not at the end of its life.The fabric is crumbling and each year for l0 years thousands of pounds have been spent in keeping the pool open.At present a brand new Sports and Leisure Complex stands virtually completed but unopened.The Council were unable to fund such a scheme."JASPA LTD."a private firm said they could provide this facility for half the Council's estimate.Jaspa,however,went into bankcruptcy with Â£250,000 of work to be done.If the old Baths close this year there will be no swimming in the Borough until Autumn l986 when the St. Annes Baths Complex should be opened. {"Leafy Lytham"}ravaged by Dutch Elm disease.Replanting policy by Civic Society and Council inadequate. {
